revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Trainers' School |image = [[File:Trainers' School.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Trainers' School. |tokens = 757,500 |location = Southeast of Route 1 Haou'li Outskirts }}
<!--T:2--> '''Trainers' School''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 11,407,338 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Alolan Meowth.png|40px]] Alolan Meowth ||rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Youth_Athlete_(female).png|40px]] Youth Athlete Hiromi || rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Bonsly.png|40px]] Bonsly |- | [[File:Abra.png|40px]] Abra |- | [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite ||rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Preschooler (female).png|40px]] Preschooler Mia ||rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Metapod.png|40px]] Metapod |- | [[File:Alolan Grimer.png|40px]] Alolan Grimer |- | [[File:Wingull.png|40px]] Wingull ||rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Youngster Joey ||rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Alolan Grimer.png|40px]] Alolan Grimer |- | |[[File:Mime Jr..png|40px]] Mime Jr. |- | [[File:Zorua.png|40px]] Zorua ||rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Rising Star (male).png|40px]] Rising Star Joseph ||rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Ekans |- | [[File:Furfrou.png|40px]] Furfrou |}
